about_the_game:
You will find yourself inside a mysterious hotel, where every corridor conceals its own secrets and dangers. Your goal is to reach the very bottom floor, but the path will be strewn with trials and puzzles.

Your only compass is the benchmark floor, which you must find and remember. Ahead of you are corridors where reality can warp, anomalies may lurk at every turn. One wrong decision, and you could find yourself trapped forever.

Your ability to discern differences from the benchmark floor will be your key to success. If you notice a difference, turn back to avoid danger. If everything appears normal, proceed forward, getting closer to your goal.

Carefully and attentively explore every corner of the hotel, trust your intuition and resourcefulness. Only then will you be able to overcome all obstacles and reach the very bottom floor, gaining your freedom.

name: Any way out

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: intel Core i7 4770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Explore a mysterious hotel's treacherous corridors to reach the bottom floor and escape. Use your wits to spot anomalies, avoiding traps to progress. Trust your intuition to overcome challenges and find freedom.
